In linguistics, identifying active and passive voice in sentences is crucial. Classify the following sentence as either active or passive:
The chair was quickly repaired.
Please write the sentence in the [Latex] data format, with the active or passive verb highlighted for clarity.

The sentence "The chair was quickly repaired." is in the passive voice.

To highlight the passive verb in LaTeX format, you can use the `\textbf{}` command to make the verb bold. Here is how you can write the sentence:

```latex
The chair was \textbf{quickly repaired}.
```

In this sentence, "was repaired" is the passive verb phrase indicating that the subject "the chair" is receiving the action.
